title: Ep. - 278 - PRODUCER OF CHEER, HOME GAME, CHEF’S TABLE, LAST CHANCE U
description:
Andrew Fried is a documentary filmmaker, producer and director, and the president of Boardwalk Pictures. Boardwalk Pictures produces outstanding documentary films and television series, such as Chef's Table, The Black Godfather, Last Chance U, 7 Days Out, Street Food, Cheer, and The Goop Lab with Gwyneth Paltrow, Cheer, and Home Game.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Amazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca
